metadata.Title: CVE-2022-27239 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In cifs-utils through 6.14, a stack-based buffer overflow when parsing themount.cifs ip= command-line argument could lead to local attackers gainingroot privileges.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-27239` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cifs-utils - 2:6.14-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cifs-utils package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:6.14-1.1').
